sub_title: Marketing Professional | Luxury Travel & Lifestyle Content Creator | Instagram Influencer | over 1.6 million followers
summary:
Senior Marketer with over 15 years experience in marketing communications, online marketing, social media and public relations -- specifically in the luxury and hospitality industries.

Co founder of the luxury travel and lifestyle websites “No Destinations” and “Taste in Hotels” — which combined reach over 1.6 million social media users.

With a passion for travel and the online world, I am a very much a forward thinker and believe in using technology to build brand awareness and engagement. I can be a bit scrappy at times and always with the intention of getting the project done. I'm a story teller with the ability to be relatable through strong photography and words. I've been both a marketer and influencer, so I know how to balance the requirements  of the business as well as the needs of an influencer. Comfortable working across multiple teams to achieve a common goal and to influence stakeholders.

projects.title: No Destinations - A Luxury Travel Blog for Digital Nomads
projects.description: No Destinations is a website created by us (Chris & Danika) that documents our life traveling around the world and being digital nomads.  In March of 2014 we left our home in San Francisco and set off for an adventure around the world. We knew we wanted to start in Europe, make our way through Asia and then just see where the road took us. No Destinations is our scrapbook of photos and the memories we make along the way. So far we've been to over 12 countries and 40 cities and our bucket list just seems to be getting longer by the day. We hope you like our little corner of the internet and please feel free to leave us recommendations or say hi...we love good food, good cocktails and even better views! Cheers.

profile_positions.description:
• Created travel and lifestyle brands geared towards those seeking premium travel experiences that are equal parts luxury, adventure, and fun. Currently reach 1.6 million people via Instagram 
• Established partnerships with leading Travel, Hospitality, and Lifestyle brands, including:  BMW, Lexus, Ritz-Carlton, Four Seasons, Seabourn Cruises, Tumi, A.Lange & Sohne and more 
• Personally planned and executed hundreds of trips with top hotels around the world to drive awareness through custom content creation, in-depth reviews, and social media promotion 
• Collaborated with dozens of top rated restaurants in the world, including many establishments from the World’s 50 Best List as well as one, two, and three starred Michelin restaurants  
• Nurture ongoing relationships with sales and marketing leaders throughout the travel and hospitality space
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
• Oversaw marketing and public relations for this San Francisco based hotel group, composed of 5 different Bay Area properties.
•  Collaborated with sales and executive leadership to develop and execute marketing initiatives resulting in 40% increase in bookings/revenue in the first year.
•  Established strategic partnerships with brands such as: Perrier, Ghirardelli, the San Francisco Giants, the Golden State Warriors and more
•  Oversaw the redesign of corporate brand identity; including logo, website, marketing collateral and advertisements
•  Successfully led the implementation of CRM and Marketing Automation tools on the hotel websites
•  Created the social media strategies for the individual hotel properties
profile_positions.title: Director of Marketing

profile_positions.description:
JustLuxe is a luxury Web publication providing objective analysis and information to affluent consumers of luxury goods, services and travel.
 • Executed online marketing campaigns resulting in over a million unique visitors a month
• Secured multi-million dollar advertising campaigns with brands such as: Jaguar, Bombay Sapphire, Zenith Watches, and more
• Managed a team of Content Producers, Graphic Designers, Web Developers, and Sales Professionals to develop web sites and advertising campaigns
• Created pitch decks and proposals for potential advertisers and partners
• Negotiated media buys and contracts
• Managed affiliate programs through Linkshare and Commission Junction
profile_positions.title: Senior Editor and San Francisco Editor

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Associate Publisher

profile_positions.description:
